VB_Backup.synopsis: VB when the hook horror makes a noise to call it's friends.

VB.synopsis: VB when the players see a hook horror on a cliff eating a person.

VB_Backup_1.speaker: Player
VB_Backup_1.text: Hells. We're attracting too much attention!

VB_0.speaker: Player
VB_0.text: Magga cammara. That's a hook horror.
VB_0.context: InternalNodeContext: Character familiar with Hook Horrors says VBNodeContext: whispered. Straj pronounced stradj, gr'rack pronounced grack, magga cammara pronounced Mag-ah Cam-ah-rah; all mean something along the lines of 'damn it'.

VB_1.speaker: Player
VB_1.text: By the hells, what is that?
